s: Summary: Hong Kong Digital Wealth Institutional Forum convenes asset managers, fintech innovators and regulators to discuss tokenized wealth solutions for high‑net‑worth clients.
Topics: Digital asset custody, tokenized securities, compliance frameworks, AI‑driven portfolio analytics, cross‑border distribution.
Speakers: Leading wealth managers, fintech CEOs, SFC officials, tokenization platform founders.
r: Learn best practices for institutional token custody and compliance.
Network with senior wealth‑management executives seeking crypto exposure.
Gain actionable insights on AI‑enhanced portfolio construction.
